Forecasting_Current_User_Pic.label: Forecasting_Current_User_Pic
Forecasting_Current_User_Pic.query: q1 = load "${App.Datasets.forecast_snapshot31_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q2 = load "${App.Datasets.forecastingquota34_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q1 = filter q1 by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Closed"; q1 = filter q1 by {{coalesce(cell(Forecasting_Team_Performance_Directs.selection, 0, "User_UniqueUserName"), cell(Current_User.selection, 0, "User_Name")).asEquality('User_Name')}}; q = cogroup q1 by 'User_UniqueUserName' left, q2 by 'Quota_Role_RoleNames'; q = foreach q generate q1.'User_UniqueUserName' as 'User_UniqueUserName', first(q1.'User_SmallPhotoUrl') as 'Photo', sum(q1.'ForecastAmount') as 'sum_Amount', sum(q2.'QuotaAmount') as 'sum_QuotaAmount', sum(q1.'ForecastAmount')/sum(q2.'QuotaAmount')*100 as 'sum_quota_attainment'; q = order q by 'User_UniqueUserName' asc;

Forecasting_Revenue_Over_Time_With_Predi.label: Forecasting_Revenue_Over_Time_With_Prediction
Forecasting_Revenue_Over_Time_With_Predi.query: opp = load "${App.Datasets.forecast_snapshot31_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; opp = filter opp by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Closed"; opp = filter opp by {{coalesce(cell(Forecasting_Team_Performance_Directs.selection, 0, "User_UniqueUserName"), cell(Current_User.selection, 0, "User_Name")).asEquality('User_Name')}}; opp = filter opp by date('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day') in [.."current day"]; k = group opp by all; k = foreach k generate "1970" as 'Date_Year', "01" as 'Date_Month', "01" as 'Date_Day'; k = group k by ('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day'); k = foreach k generate 'Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day', count() as 'sum'; k = fill k by (dateCols=('Date_Year','Date_Month','Date_Day', "Y-M-D")); k = timeseries k generate 'sum' as 'cnt' with (length=25000,  dateCols=('Date_Year','Date_Month','Date_Day', "Y-M-D")); k = filter k by {{row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]).asDateRange("date('Date_Year','Date_Month', 'Date_Day')")}}; k = filter k by date('Date_Year','Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in [.."current day"]; k = group k by all; k1 = foreach k generate first('Date_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', first('Date_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', first('Date_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day'; k2 = foreach k generate last('Date_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', last('Date_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', last('Date_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day'; k3 = union k1,k2; a = group opp by ('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'); a = foreach a generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', sum(a.'ForecastAmount') as 'A'; c = union a,k3; c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'A'; c = fill c by (dateCols=('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month','Period_StartDate_Day', "Y-M-D")); c = group c by ('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'); c = foreach c generate c.'Period_StartDate_Year' + "~~~" + c.'Period_StartDate_Month' + "~~~" + c.'Period_StartDate_Day' as 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', first(A) as 'A', 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'; c = group c by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day'); c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', first(A) as 'A', first('Period_StartDate_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', first('Period_StartDate_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', first('Period_StartDate_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day', sum(sum(A)) over ([..0] partition by all order by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day')) as 'sum_Amount'; c = timeseries c generate 'sum_Amount' as 'estimate' with (length=100, predictionInterval=95, ignoreLast=false, dateCols=('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month','Period_StartDate_Day', "Y-M-D")); c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'Period_StartDate_Year' + "~~~" + 'Period_StartDate_Month' + "~~~" + 'Period_StartDate_Day' as 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', A, sum_Amount, estimate, estimate_high_95, estimate_low_95; c = filter c by {{row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]).asDateRange("date('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day')")}}; c = order c by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day' asc);

Time_Stamp.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_snapshot32_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate toDate("{{cell(Snapshot_Text_Date.selection, 0, "SnapshotTextDate").asString()}}","yyyy-MM-dd") as 'Snapshot_Date'; q = foreach q generate "Today: " + toString('Snapshot_Date', "MMM dd, yyyy") + " | " + number_to_string(daysBetween('Snapshot_Date', quarter_last_day('Snapshot_Date')),"##0") + " days left in quarter" as 'time', number_to_string(daysBetween('Snapshot_Date', quarter_last_day('Snapshot_Date')),"##0") as 'days_left_in_quarter';

KPI_Predicted_WinRate.label: KPI_Predicted_WinRate

Forecasting_Revenue_Final_Prediction.label: Forecasting_Revenue_Final_Prediction
Forecasting_Revenue_Final_Prediction.query: opp = load "${App.Datasets.forecast_snapshot31_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; opp = filter opp by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Closed"; opp = filter opp by {{coalesce(cell(Forecasting_Team_Performance_Directs.selection, 0, "User_UniqueUserName"), cell(Current_User.selection, 0, "User_Name")).asEquality('User_Name')}}; opp = filter opp by date('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day') in [.."current day"]; k = group opp by all; k = foreach k generate "1970" as 'Date_Year', "01" as 'Date_Month', "01" as 'Date_Day'; k = group k by ('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day'); k = foreach k generate 'Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day', count() as 'sum'; k = fill k by (dateCols=('Date_Year','Date_Month','Date_Day', "Y-M-D")); k = timeseries k generate 'sum' as 'cnt' with (length=25000,  dateCols=('Date_Year','Date_Month','Date_Day', "Y-M-D")); k = filter k by {{row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]).asDateRange("date('Date_Year','Date_Month', 'Date_Day')")}}; k = filter k by date('Date_Year','Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in [.."current day"]; k = group k by all; k1 = foreach k generate first('Date_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', first('Date_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', first('Date_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day'; k2 = foreach k generate last('Date_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', last('Date_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', last('Date_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day'; k3 = union k1,k2; a = group opp by ('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'); a = foreach a generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', sum(a.'ForecastAmount') as 'A'; c = union a,k3; c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'A'; c = fill c by (dateCols=('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month','Period_StartDate_Day', "Y-M-D")); c = group c by ('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'); c = foreach c generate c.'Period_StartDate_Year' + "~~~" + c.'Period_StartDate_Month' + "~~~" + c.'Period_StartDate_Day' as 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', first(A) as 'A', 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'; c = group c by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day'); c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', first(A) as 'A', first('Period_StartDate_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', first('Period_StartDate_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', first('Period_StartDate_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day', sum(sum(A)) over ([..0] partition by all order by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day')) as 'sum_Amount'; c = timeseries c generate 'sum_Amount' as 'estimate' with (length=100, predictionInterval=95, ignoreLast=false, dateCols=('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month','Period_StartDate_Day', "Y-M-D")); c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'Period_StartDate_Year' + "~~~" + 'Period_StartDate_Month' + "~~~" + 'Period_StartDate_Day' as 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', A, sum_Amount, estimate, estimate_high_95, estimate_low_95; c = filter c by {{row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]).asDateRange("date('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day')")}}; c = group c by all; c = foreach c generate last('estimate') as 'sum_prediction', last('estimate_high_95') as 'upper_bound', last('estimate_low_95') as 'lower_bound';

Forecasting_Team_Performance_Directs.label: Forecasting_Team_Performance_Directs
Forecasting_Team_Performance_Directs.query: opp = load "${App.Datasets.forecast_snapshot31_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; opp = filter opp by {{cell(Current_User.selection, 0, "User_Name").asEquality('User_Role_ParentRole_ForecastManager_Name')}}; opp = filter opp by date('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day') in [.."current day"]; quota = load "${App.Datasets.forecastingquota34_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; quota = filter quota by !({{cell(Current_User.selection, 0, "User_Name").asEquality('Quota_Name')}}); k = group opp by all; k = foreach k generate "1970" as 'Date_Year', "01" as 'Date_Month', "01" as 'Date_Day'; k = group k by ('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day'); k = foreach k generate 'Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day', count() as 'sum'; k = fill k by (dateCols=('Date_Year','Date_Month','Date_Day', "Y-M-D")); k = timeseries k generate 'sum' as 'cnt' with (length=25000,  dateCols=('Date_Year','Date_Month','Date_Day', "Y-M-D")); k = filter k by {{row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]).asDateRange("date('Date_Year','Date_Month', 'Date_Day')")}}; k = filter k by date('Date_Year','Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in [.."current day"]; k = group k by all; k1 = foreach k generate first('Date_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', first('Date_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', first('Date_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day', " - " as 'User_UniqueUserName'; k2 = foreach k generate last('Date_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', last('Date_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', last('Date_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day', " - " as 'User_UniqueUserName'; k3 = union k1,k2; a = filter opp by 'ForecastCategoryName' in ["Closed"]; a = group a by ('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName'); a = foreach a generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName', sum(a.'ForecastAmount') as 'A'; c = union a,k3; c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day','User_UniqueUserName', 'A'; c = fill c by (dateCols=('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month','Period_StartDate_Day', "Y-M-D"), partition='User_UniqueUserName'); c = filter c by 'User_UniqueUserName' not in [" - "]; c = group c by ('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName'); c = foreach c generate c.'Period_StartDate_Year' + "~~~" + c.'Period_StartDate_Month' + "~~~" + c.'Period_StartDate_Day' as 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName', first(A) as 'A', 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'; c = group c by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName'); c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName', first(A) as 'A', first('Period_StartDate_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', first('Period_StartDate_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', first('Period_StartDate_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day', sum(sum(A)) over ([..0] partition by 'User_UniqueUserName' order by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day')) as 'sum_Amount'; c = timeseries c generate 'sum_Amount' as 'estimate' with (partition='User_UniqueUserName',length=100, predictionInterval=95, ignoreLast=false, dateCols=('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month','Period_StartDate_Day', "Y-M-D")); c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'Period_StartDate_Year' + "~~~" + 'Period_StartDate_Month' + "~~~" + 'Period_StartDate_Day' as 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName', A, sum_Amount, estimate, estimate_high_95, estimate_low_95; c = filter c by {{row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]).asDateRange("date('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day')")}}; c = group c by 'User_UniqueUserName'; c = foreach c generate 'User_UniqueUserName', last('estimate') as 'sum_prediction'; actual = filter opp by {{column(static_1.selection, ["Display"]).asEquality("ForecastCategoryName")}}; q = cogroup actual by 'User_UniqueUserName' left, quota by 'Quota_UniqueUserName' left, c by 'User_UniqueUserName'; q = foreach q generate coalesce(actual.'User_UniqueUserName', first(quota.'Quota_UniqueUserName'), c.'User_UniqueUserName') as 'User_UniqueUserName', first(actual.'User_SmallPhotoUrl') as 'Photo', sum(actual.'ForecastAmount') as 'sum_Amount', sum(quota.'QuotaAmount') as 'sum_QuotaAmount', sum(actual.'ForecastAmount')/sum(quota.'QuotaAmount')*100 as 'sum_quota_attainment', sum(c.'sum_prediction')/sum(quota.'QuotaAmount')*100 as 'sum_user_prediction', sum(c.'sum_prediction') as 'sum_prediction_amount'; q = order q by 'sum_user_prediction' desc nulls last;

Forecasting_Team_Performance_Current_Use.label: Forecasting_Team_Performance_Current_User
Forecasting_Team_Performance_Current_Use.query: opp = load "${App.Datasets.forecast_snapshot31_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; opp = filter opp by {{cell(Current_User.selection, 0, "User_Name").asEquality('User_Name')}}; opp = filter opp by date('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day') in [.."current day"]; quota = load "${App.Datasets.forecastingquota34_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; quota = filter quota by {{cell(Current_User.selection, 0, "User_Name").asEquality('Quota_Role_RoleNames')}}; k = group opp by all; k = foreach k generate "1970" as 'Date_Year', "01" as 'Date_Month', "01" as 'Date_Day'; k = group k by ('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day'); k = foreach k generate 'Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day', count() as 'sum'; k = fill k by (dateCols=('Date_Year','Date_Month','Date_Day', "Y-M-D")); k = timeseries k generate 'sum' as 'cnt' with (length=25000,  dateCols=('Date_Year','Date_Month','Date_Day', "Y-M-D")); k = filter k by {{row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]).asDateRange("date('Date_Year','Date_Month', 'Date_Day')")}}; k = filter k by date('Date_Year','Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in [.."current day"]; k = group k by all; k1 = foreach k generate first('Date_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', first('Date_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', first('Date_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day', " - " as 'User_UniqueUserName'; k2 = foreach k generate last('Date_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', last('Date_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', last('Date_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day', " - " as 'User_UniqueUserName'; k3 = union k1,k2; a = filter opp by 'ForecastCategoryName' in ["Closed"]; a = group a by ('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName'); a = foreach a generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName', sum(a.'ForecastAmount') as 'A'; c = union a,k3; c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day','User_UniqueUserName', 'A'; c = fill c by (dateCols=('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month','Period_StartDate_Day', "Y-M-D"), partition='User_UniqueUserName'); c = filter c by 'User_UniqueUserName' not in [" - "]; c = group c by ('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName'); c = foreach c generate c.'Period_StartDate_Year' + "~~~" + c.'Period_StartDate_Month' + "~~~" + c.'Period_StartDate_Day' as 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName', first(A) as 'A', 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'; c = group c by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName'); c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName', first(A) as 'A', first('Period_StartDate_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', first('Period_StartDate_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', first('Period_StartDate_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day', sum(sum(A)) over ([..0] partition by 'User_UniqueUserName' order by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day')) as 'sum_Amount'; c = timeseries c generate 'sum_Amount' as 'estimate' with (partition='User_UniqueUserName',length=100, predictionInterval=95, ignoreLast=false, dateCols=('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month','Period_StartDate_Day', "Y-M-D")); c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'Period_StartDate_Year' + "~~~" + 'Period_StartDate_Month' + "~~~" + 'Period_StartDate_Day' as 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', 'User_UniqueUserName', A, sum_Amount, estimate, estimate_high_95, estimate_low_95; c = filter c by {{row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]).asDateRange("date('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day')")}}; c = group c by 'User_UniqueUserName'; c = foreach c generate 'User_UniqueUserName', last('estimate') as 'sum_prediction'; actual = filter opp by {{column(static_1.selection, ["Display"]).asEquality("ForecastCategoryName")}}; q = cogroup actual by 'User_UniqueUserName' full, quota by 'Quota_UniqueUserName' full, c by 'User_UniqueUserName'; q = foreach q generate coalesce(actual.'User_UniqueUserName', first(quota.'Quota_UniqueUserName'), c.'User_UniqueUserName') as 'User_UniqueUserName', coalesce(first(actual.'User_Name'), first(quota.'Quota_Name')) as 'User_Name', first(actual.'User_SmallPhotoUrl') as 'Photo', sum(actual.'ForecastAmount') as 'sum_Amount', sum(quota.'QuotaAmount') as 'sum_QuotaAmount', sum(actual.'ForecastAmount')/sum(quota.'QuotaAmount')*100 as 'sum_quota_attainment', sum(c.'sum_prediction')/sum(quota.'QuotaAmount')*100 as 'sum_user_prediction', sum(c.'sum_prediction') as 'sum_prediction_amount'; q = order q by 'sum_user_prediction' desc nulls last;
